dialogue.describe: You seem to understand this Xenoid threat better than most…
dialogue.offer: You're kitted out better than most… would you be interested in going out on a quick combat patrol against the Xenoids.  I'll lend you a hand to the best of my ability but will be taking point against the alien invaders, what do you say?
dialogue.accepted: Good, lets do this quick and efficiently.  We are both coming back here alive after this.
dialogue.rejected: Hey, I know I wouldn't volunteer for it either… but then I remember that most of us survivors won't make it unless someone decides to take the initiative.
dialogue.advice: I'd secure an ammo cache and try to sweep a town in multiple passes.
dialogue.success: Excellent worth, it was a pleasure working with you.  Now lets go back to base.
dialogue.success_lie: I don't think that was quite a dozen xenoids.
